name: oci_pconnect
purpose: Connect to an Oracle database using a persistent connection

return.description: Returns a connection identifier or FALSE on error.

notes.description:
Starting with PHP 5.1.2 and PECL oci8 1.1, the lifetime and
    maximum number of persistent Oracle connections can be tuned by setting
    the following configuration values: oci8.persistent_timeout,
    oci8.ping_interval and
    oci8.max_persistent.

In PHP versions before 5.0.0 you must
    use ociplogon instead.
    The old function name can still be used
in current versions, however it is deprecated and not recommended.
